name: Horse Derby Quest Sim
description:
Horse Derby Quest Sim is the most realistic horse racing best hurdle simulation game of 2018. It’s time to step inside the horse racing tracks and get ready for participating in the most chronicle horce racing game.
You have enough riding skills that you can ride dual horses and dodge cleverly and jump highly over the hurdles. Ride in four different environments with your wild horses. Each environment has its own attraction, feeling and atmosphere. You have to maintain the speed and as well as horse stamina. Horse racing is a sensational and challenging game for youngsters who want to improve their horse racing skills. Run your horse and collect all the things that come on your way and avoid hitting hoof of the horse to the hurdles. You will enjoy to play this unique horse riding simulation game. Simple and intuitive controls, amazing sounds effects, hd graphics and marvellous environment. So don’t waste your time, just download this horse riding game and enjoy the ultimate fun of riding and racing.
